package.name: Yobun Pro
package.shortDescription: Managing the processes of your device.

descriptionlist.description:
Swipe up with two fingers on the home screen to bring up the control menu. Features Yobun Pro: • Switch the dark / light mode of the system. • IP WiFi monitoring. • Fast and easy respring. • LDRestart. • Entering safe mode. • Clearing the cache. • Geolocation management, WiFi and Bluetooth. • Monitoring of RAM.
Download button skins to "/ var / mobile / Documents / yobunpro".
ATTENTION! The LDRestart function is NOT available for users of devices with A12 and A13 processors.
